newsitem.title: GERMANY: W. German Ifo business climate index jumps in July.
newsitem.headline: W. German Ifo business climate index jumps in July.

text.p: Germany's respected Ifo institute said on Wednesday its West Germany business climate index for July jumped to 94.1 from 90.4 in June.

The index had been hotly awaited in financial markets, with many players looking for a weak figure, which would make it more likely that the German Bundesbank would cut its main money market interest rate, the securities repurchase rate or repo, on Thursday.
Economists had expected at best a slight improvement in the index from June's level, which was a three-month low.
